test.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_merged_data (a UInt64, b Nullable(UInt64), c String, d Nullable(String)) ENGINE = Memory()
test.fill_query: insert into t_opt_orderby select * from generateRandom('a UInt64, b Nullable(UInt64), c String, d Nullable(String)') limit 1000000
test.query: select * from t_merged_data order by a
select * from t_merged_data order by b
select * from t_merged_data order by c
select * from t_merged_data order by d
